actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act to require retro-reflectors on railroad cars.

summary.text: Amends the Interstate Commerce Act to prohibit a carrier from using a railroad car that is not equipped with retroreflectors. Directs the Interstate Commerce Commission to issue regulations prescribing the use of such retroreflectors.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act to require retro-reflectors on railroad cars.
